ext_weather.name: Overnight
ext_weather.detailedForecast: A chance of rain showers before 2am. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 72. South wind around 5 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

Space Weather Message Code: ALTTP2

Description: Type II emissions occur in association with eruptions on the sun and typically indicate a coronal mass ejection is associated with a flare event.
